_comment: Template egg for Econ Game Frontend (Next.js) with Bun
name: Econ Frontend (Bun)
description: Next.js frontend built and run with Bun.
startup: cd {{WORK_DIR}} && if [ -f package.json ]; then bun install --production; fi; bun run bun:build && bun run {{START_CMD}}

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python3 python-is-python3 libtool
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "true" ] || [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "1" ]; then
    echo 'User will upload files. Skipping git clone.'
    exit 0
fi

if [[ -z "${GIT_ADDRESS}" ]]; then
    echo 'No GIT_ADDRESS provided, nothing to clone.'
    exit 0
fi

if [[ ${GIT_ADDRESS} != *.git ]]; then GIT_ADDRESS=${GIT_ADDRESS}.git; fi

if [ -n "${USERNAME}" ] && [ -n "${ACCESS_TOKEN}" ]; then
  GIT_ADDRESS="https://${USERNAME}:${ACCESS_TOKEN}@$(echo -e ${GIT_ADDRESS} | cut -d/ -f3-)"
fi

echo 'Cloning repository...'
if [ -z ${BRANCH} ]; then
  git clone ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
else
  git clone --single-branch --branch ${BRANCH} ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
fi

echo 'Done.'

variables.name: User Uploaded Files
variables.description: Skip cloning if user uploads files (1=true)
